Address.label: Address
Address.value: 120 CORPORATE BOULEVARD, NORFOLK, Virginia, 23502, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: PRA Group Inc is a company that primarily acquires, collects, and processes nonperforming loans in the Americas and Europe. The accounts acquired by the company are unpaid obligations of individuals owed to credit grantors, which primarily include banks and other types of consumer, retail, and auto finance companies It acquires portfolios of nonperforming loans in two categories: Core and Insolvency. The company generates the majority of its sales from the United States.
